text: I've found this: <https://github.com/damiendr/HDFTables.jl> but it doesn't seem maintained

Might be worth reviving the idea and doing a proper Tables.jl integration; we'd mainly want to extract out the "reading" parts from that package and then have a proper "table" type that implements the Tables.jl source interface. Happy to help brainstorm a plan on this.
